keyFacts: The document outlines corporate resolutions adopted by the Boards of Directors of Southern Trust Company, Inc. and Financial Infomatics, Inc.
Jeffrey Epstein is the sole shareholder of Southern Trust Company, Inc. and holds significant shares in Financial Infomatics, Inc.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn are also directors and hold officer positions in both corporations.
The resolutions include the transfer of shares and a merger between Financial Trust Company, Inc. and Southern Financial, LLC.
The document indicates that the merger is intended to qualify as a tax-free reorganization under U.S. tax law.
